Content:: This article documents the chronology and epidemiology of SARS-CoV-2, the virus that causes the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and is responsible for the COVID-19 pandemic, in May 2021. The first human cases of COVID-19 were identified in Wuhan, China, in December 2019. World Health Organization weekly report:[19] World Health Organization weekly report:[75] World Health Organization weekly report:[123] World Health Organization weekly report:[171] Countries and territories that confirmed their first cases during May 2021: By the end of May 2021, only the following countries and territories have not reported any cases of SARS-CoV-2 infections: Asia Europe Oceania
Title: Timeline of the COVID-19 pandemic in May 2021 - Wikipedia
